Translations.Text: Kaya yala ti vela mahita nahi jevha kabarimadhye je (kahi) ahe, kadhuna ghetale ja'ila
Ani manatalya gupta gostinna ughada kele ja'ila
Nihsansaya, yanca palanakarta tya divasi yancya avastheci purepura khabara rakhanara asela
Khadakhadavinari
Kaya ahe ti khadakhadavinari
Tumhala kaya mahita ki ti khadakhadavinari kaya ahe
Jya divasi manase itastatah vikhuralelya kitaka patangampramane hotila
Ani parvata, pinjalelya rangita lokarisarakhe hotila
Maga jyace parade vajanata bhari asela
Tara to aisa-aramacya jivanata asela
Ani jyace parade vajanata halake asela
Tara tyace thikana ‘haviya’ ahe
Ani tumhala kaya mahita ki ti kaya ahe
Ti khupa prakharatene bhadakata asaleli aga ahe
Jastita jasta milavinyacya mohane tumhala gaphila karuna takale
Yetheparyarnta ki tumhi kabrastanata ja'una pohocale (daphana jhale)
Mulica nahi, tumhi lavakaraca januna ghyala
Mulica nahi, tumhala phara lavakara kaluna ye'ila
Mulica nahi, jara tumhi khatrisirapane januna ghyala
Tara niscitaca tumhi jahannama jarura pahala
Ani tumhi tila visvasacya dolyanni pahala
Maga tya divasi tumhala niscitapane krpa denagyambabata vicarale ja'ila
Kalaci sapatha
Vastuta sare manava purnatah ghatyata aheta
Matra tya lokankherija, jyanni imana rakhale ani satkarma karita rahile ani (jyanni) apasata satyavara kayama rahanyaci takida keli ani ekamekanna dhira sanyama rakhanyaca upadesa kela
Mothi va'ita avastha ahe asa tya pratyeka manasaci jo vyanga dosa sodhanara, cahadi karanara asela
Jo dhana - daulata ekatra karato ani mojuna thevato
To ase samajato ki tyaci dhana - daulata tyancyajavala sada sarvakala rahila
Mulica nahi. Ha tara curada karuna takanarya agita phekala ja'ila
Ani tumhala kaya mahita ki asi aga kaya asela
Ti allahane petavileli aga asela
Ji hrdayanvara cadhataca ja'ila
(Ti aga) sagalikaduna bandista asela
Ani tyancyavara mothamothya khambammadhye
Kaya tumhi nahi pahile ki tumacya palanakartyane hattivalyansi kasa vyavahara kela
Kaya tyanca dava asaphala nahi kela
Ani tyancyavara paksyancya jhundivara jhundi pathavilya
Je tyancyavara mati ani dagadancya khadyanca mara karita hote
Maga tyanna kha'una takalelya bhusa (cothya) pramane karuna takale
Kuraisala asakti milavuna denyakarita
(Arthata) tyanna sardi va garamicya pravasaci savaya lavuna denyakarita
Tyanni (krtajnata mhanuna) ya gharacya (kabagrhacya) svamici upasana karita rahile pahije
Jyane tyanna bhukelya avastheta khayala dile ani bhaya-dahasaticya avastheta santi (suraksa) pradana keli
Kaya tumhi (tyalahi) pahile jo mobadalyacya divasala khote tharavito
Haca to hoya, jo anathala dhakke marato
Ani garibala jevu ghalanyasa protsahana deta nahi
Tya namaji lokankarita ‘vaila’ (namaka jahannamaci eka jaga) ahe
Je apalya namajampasuna gaphila aheta
Je kevala dekhava dakhavitata
Ani vaparanyaci vastu rokhuna dharatata
Nihsansaya, amhi tumhala kausara (ani bareca kahi) pradana kele ahe
Tevha, tumhi apalya palanakartyasathi namaja padha ani kurbani kara
Nihsansaya, tumaca satruca bevarasi ani nava-nisana nasalela ahe
Tumhi sanguna taka ki he inkari lokanno
Na mi upasana karato tyaci, jyaci tumhi upasana karata
Na tumhi upasana karanare ahata tyaci, jyaci mi upasana karato
Ani na mi upasana karena tyaci, jyaci tumhi upasana karata
Ani na tumhi tyaci upasana karala, jyaci mi upasana karato
Tumacyasathi tumaca dina (dharma) ahe ani majhyasathi majha dina (dharma) ahe
Jevha allahatarphe madata ani vijaya prapta ho'ila
Ani lokanna tumhi allahacya dina (dharma) kade samuhasamuhanni yetana pahala
Tevha apalya palanakartyaci stuti prasansesaha pavitrata varnana karu laga ani tyacyajavala ksama yacaneci prarthana karita raha. Nihsansaya, to motha tauba (ksama-yacana) kabula karanara ahe
Abu lahabace donhi hata tutale ani to (svatah) nasta jhala
Na tara tyaci sampatti tyacya kami ali ani na tyaci kama'i
Lavakaraca to bhadakanarya agita ja'una padela
Ani tyaci patnihi (ja'ila), ji lakade vahuna nenari ahe
Ticya galyata khajuricya salica pila ghatalela dorakhanda asela
Tumhi sanga ki to allaha ekameva ahe
Allaha nirapeksa ahe
Na tyacyapasuna koni janmasa ala na to konapasuna janmala
Ani na koni tyaca samakaksa ahe
Tumhi sanga ki mi pratahkalacya svamicya saranata yeto
Tya pratyeka vastucya upadravapasuna ji tyane nirmana keli ahe
Ani andharamaya ratricya upadravapasuna, jevha tica andhara pasarela
Ani gathi (bandhuna tya) vara phunkanarincya upadravapasuna (hi)
Ani irsya karanaryancya upadravapasunahi, jevha te irsya karatila
Tumhi sanga, mi lokancya palanakartyacya saranata yeto
Lokancya svamicya (ani)
Lokancya upasya (allaha) cya (asrayata)
(Manata) kuvicara takanarya, mage hatanaryacya upadravapasuna
Jo lokancya manata va'ita vicara takato
(Maga to) jinnampaiki aso kinva manasampaiki
